sentences.simplifiedText: 她被强烈的冲动所驱使。
sentences.traditionalText: 她被強烈的衝動所驅使。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bèi qiángliè de chōngdòng suǒ qūshǐ.
sentences.translation: She is driven by a strong urge.

sentences.simplifiedText: 当他看到那件惊人的发现时，他有一种冲动想把它告诉全世界。
sentences.traditionalText: 當他看到那件驚人的發現時，他有一種衝動想把它告訴全世界。
sentences.pinyin: Dāng tā kàn dào nà jiàn jīngrén de fāxiàn shí, tā yǒu yīzhǒng chōngdòng xiǎng bǎ tā gàosu quán shìjiè.
sentences.translation: When he saw that astonishing discovery, he felt an urge to tell the entire world.

sentences.simplifiedText: 当他生气时，他控制住了冲动。
sentences.traditionalText: 當他生氣時，他控制住了衝動。
sentences.pinyin: Dāng tā shēngqì shí, tā kòngzhì zhù le chōngdòng.
sentences.translation: When he was angry, he controlled his impulse.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他对那件事感到非常生气，但他努力抑制住自己的冲动。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他對那件事感到非常生氣，但他努力抑制住自己的衝動。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn tā duì nà jiàn shì gǎndào fēicháng shēngqì, dàn tā nǔlì yìzhì zhù zìjǐ de chōngdòng.
sentences.translation: Despite feeling very angry about the situation, he tried hard to control his impulse.
